title: Local Government By-Elections (Election Dates and Times of Poll) Order, 2017
content:
24th February, 2017 Statutory Instruments 77
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.18 OF 2017
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Local Government By-Election (Election Dates and
Times of Poll) Order, 2017
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government By- Title
Elections (Election Dates and Times of Poll) Order, 2017.
2. Nominations for the election of a council chairperson in the Nomination
for election
district and ward set out in the Schedule may be lodged with the
times
returning officer on Thursday, 16th March, 2017 between 0900
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 16th Campaign
perion
March, 2017, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Monday,
24th April, 2017.
4. The poll in a district and wards for the election of a council Election
chairperson and councilor set out in the Schedule shall be taken on date and
times of poll
Tuesday 25th April, 2017, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours,
except that a poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated in the election.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
78 Statutory Instruments 24th February, 2017
